title: Eames Style Office Chair EA105 Leather    White
body: The Eames Office Chair EA105 is part of the Aluminum Group designed by Charles Eames in 1958 and is considered as the greatest furniture designs of the 20th century. An innovative design that mixes high-quality materials and minimalist styling. The slender form and generous proportion of the EA105 is both distinctive and ergonomic. Efficient in the working environment with a touch of luxury. This famous classic is rated as one of the greatest mid-century furniture invention.
